=== Picn*x 19 ===

* Date: Saturday August 21, 2010
* Time: 11AM - 4PM
* Location: <nowiki>[[http://www.sunnyvale.ca.gov/Departments/CommunityServices/Parks/BaylandsPark.aspx|Sunnyvale Baylands Park]]</nowiki>

=== Signup Info ===

If you're helping out with our booth, sign-up on the Loco Directory entry for it: <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/273/detail/]]</nowiki>

Sign-up for the Picn*x itself here (you must sign up for the picnic to get food!): <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxpicnic.org/guests/rsvp.pl]]</nowiki>

GrantBowman has been working with the <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxpicnic.org/|Picn*x]]</nowiki> folks and secured 2 tables for Ubuntu California, we'll be at tables 3H & 3I, as seen on the layout map:

<nowiki>[[http://www.linuxpicnic.org/twiki/bin/view/Picnix19/Picnx19TableLayout]]</nowiki>
